content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="ISO-8859-1"?>  <mods xmlns="http://www.loc.gov/mods/v3" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.loc.gov/mods/v3 http://www.loc.gov/standards/mods/v3/mods-3-4.xsd">    <titleInfo>       <title>Eliciting Knowledge on Science Software Sustainability from the Earth Science Informatics Community</title>    </titleInfo>    <name type="personal" ID="rd474">       <namePart type="family">Downs</namePart>       <namePart type="given">Robert R.</namePart>       <role>          <roleTerm type="text">author</roleTerm>       </role>       <affiliation>Columbia University. Center for International Earth Science Information Network</affiliation>    </name>    <name type="corporate">       <namePart>Columbia University. Center for International Earth Science Information Network</namePart>       <role>          <roleTerm type="text">originator</roleTerm>       </role>    </name>    <typeOfResource>text</typeOfResource>    <genre>Presentations</genre>    <originInfo>       <dateIssued encoding="w3cdtf" keyDate="yes">2015</dateIssued>    </originInfo>    <abstract>An overview is offered and the methodology is described for a focus group study conducted to elicit knowledge about scientific software sustainability from members of the Earth science informatics community.</abstract>    <note>Presented on 7 January 2015 during the 2015 Winter Meeting of the Federation of Earth Science Information Partners (ESIP) that was held in Washington, DC on 6-8 January 2015.</note>    <subject>       <topic>Information science</topic>    </subject>    <subject>       <topic>Computer science</topic>    </subject>    <relatedItem type="series">       <titleInfo>          <title/>       </titleInfo>    </relatedItem>    <relatedItem>       <location>          <url/>       </location>    </relatedItem>    <identifier type="CDRS doi">http://dx.doi.org/10.7916/D8668C0J</identifier>    <relatedItem type="otherVersion">     </relatedItem>    <language>       <languageTerm type="text">English</languageTerm>    </language>    <location>       <physicalLocation authority="marcorg">NNC</physicalLocation>    </location>    <recordInfo>       <recordContentSource authority="marcorg">NNC</recordContentSource>       <recordCreationDate encoding="w3cdtf">2015-01-29 12:19:27 -0500</recordCreationDate>       <recordChangeDate encoding="w3cdtf">2015-01-29 12:28:14 -0500</recordChangeDate>       <recordIdentifier>19036</recordIdentifier>       <languageOfCataloging>          <languageTerm authority="iso639-2b">eng</languageTerm>       </languageOfCataloging>    </recordInfo> </mods>
